typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID as string,
		ASOF_DT as timestamp,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		SETID as string,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_YEAR as integer,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_PERIOD as integer,
		CPMS_SOURCE_DATA_DIR_PATH as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RUNCONTROLTBL
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		SOURCE_ID as string,
		DESCR as string,
		SEQ_NO as integer,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE as integer,
		DESCRLONG as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PROCESSINSTANCETBL
RUNCONTROLTBL, PROCESSINSTANCETBL join(RUNCONTROLTBL@ENTITY_ID == PROCESSINSTANCETBL@ENTITY_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID = RUNCONTROLTBL@ENTITY_ID,
		FISCAL_YEAR,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID,
		ASOF_DT,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC,
		SETID,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_YEAR,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_PERIOD,
		CPMS_SOURCE_DATA_DIR_PATH,
		ENTITY_ID = PROCESSINSTANCETBL@ENTITY_ID,
		SOURCE_ID,
		DESCR,
		SEQ_NO,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE,
		DESCRLONG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID,
		FISCAL_YEAR,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID,
		ASOF_DT,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC,
		SETID,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_YEAR,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_PERIOD,
		CPMS_SOURCE_DATA_DIR_PATH,
		SOURCE_ID,
		DESCR,
		SEQ_NO,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE,
		DESCRLONG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FIINSTRSTG
